resources.string: Gmail application is not installed on your device!
Feedback has been sent to this app developer!

" Software for viewing Calendar ICTU Calendar is built by a group of students of Software Engineering industry of ICTUaiming to improve programming skills of group as well as serving the viewing schedule for lecturers and students' schedules the school that the group is attending,the software public source code at: "

" Entering the schedule file for teachers is very simple because the faculty members have only one calendar format,and the students will have a variety of calendar formats and software that only supports DAY format. When you take your calendar, you should pay attention!"
" A student calendar file in the form of DAY is as follows (other students have a calendar format like this, the software can still read normally):"

" In addition to displaying lecture schedules, the calendar also supports creating notes.Each blue dot indicates that the date has a schedule, each purple dot indicates that the date has 1 note, up to 1 day on the calendar displays 4 dots of the calendar and 1 note."
Schedule file must be in DAY format!
